attributes.title: DO NOT GET!!
attributes.review: absolutely horrible. as soon as i opened the app i immediately got the sensation of wanting to throw up. i eventually did. this app gave me anxiety just thinking of trump and his racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, sexist, stupid, dumb, and cowardly supporters.

attributes.title: Scammed
attributes.review: this app scammed me it sent donald trumps nudes to everyone i have a contact for they were extremely disgusted especially my great great grandma she was vomiting on snapchat if i could give it a 0 star i would🤮🤮

attributes.title: They hired a 2 year old to make this
attributes.review: This is UNDOUBTEDLY the worst app ive ever downloaded. Before I download it I was all for my almighty eagle Donald Trump, but if he’s gonna hire 2 year olds to make his apps, imagine what he’d do to our country. I’m voting Kanye. 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I feel like have a very obviously biased app as number one in news is pretty hypocritical also trump spread so much misinformation that’s classifying it as news is very wrong.

attributes.title: Wish I could give 0 stars
attributes.review: App took waaaay to long to download. Every time I open it, it crashes and forces my phone to restart. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: cannot believe it
attributes.review: cannot believe that when i opened this app, it showed me ways to vote for a president who resembles chester the cheeto man! like we all know the red hot ones are the best cheetos... why can’t he change his tan?! oh man and opening widgets was just absolutely horrible, so slow almost like our government!! 10/10 cannot believe this app is still here, it’s not helpful at all!!

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review:
Baby, I jus can’t anymore. It took a whole year to download and then it has the audacity to not work. Sorry Babe but we’re done 😚 ✌️ 

Sincerely,
Your Everything (not anymore 😔)

attributes.title: Bummer! So excited!
attributes.review: Very sad this took 2 days to completely download and whenever I click on it it glitches out completely. I soooo wish I could support our president! DO NOT GET DOESNT WORK AT ALL.:(((

attributes.title: Pseudo-Fascists Not Allowed In America
attributes.review: Your presidency is the focal point of humiliation. You are a joke. The world laughs at you. Racists, Neo-Nazis, Karens, and the rich stand at your side only because you feed them. Your disgusting ideals ruin what America stands for. Goodbye Human Trafficker and Child Rapist.

attributes.title: The app is a waste 😷👎🏻
attributes.review: Please don’t download load it, it’s just a waste of ur money! I have no hate towards anyone but come on he’s the president and he made this app trash 🤧 please no hate it’s just my opinion!! 👏🏻
